para:
Protocol changes since GT version 3.2
The aggregator framework is a complete reimplementation of the MDS3 aggregator framework using WSRF rather than OGSI protocols. No wireside compatibility with MDS3 aggregator framework. Architectural similarity should make porting straightforward.

API changes since GT version 3.2
APIs entirely rewritten, so no API compatibility. Architectural similarity should make porting straightforward.

Exception changes since GT version 3.2
See API changes above.

Schema changes since GT version 3.2
Registration interface uses WSRF rather than OGSI schemas. New per-source and per-sink configuration schemas.
